attributes.action: Renationalise the railway and bus networks of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since privatisation the rail and bus networks have reached a level of stagnation, due to the running of said networks for profit rather than for the benefit of passengers. We the undersigned believe that the government should take every action necessary to recreate the British Rail system of track and train being under the control of the people who use it; the public.

government_responses.details:
